/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with traditional Chinese buildings, their architectural details hinting at the rich history of the city. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the traditional setting. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. In the foreground, trees and bushes add a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban environment.
